text:
Westin Denver International Airport Hotel and Conference Center Opens Recruitment Center
With the opening of the Westin Denver International Airport hotel and conference center less than three months away, the hotel is opening a recruitment center inside the airport to help fill more than 180 full-time positions at the facility.
The Westin recruitment center will be located on the west side of level 6 inside the Jeppesen Terminal. It will be open from Sept. 1 to Oct. 31, from 10 a.m. to 7 p.m. Tuesday through Friday, and from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. on Saturdays.
Available positions at the Westin range from entry level to supervisory posts. The recruitment center will be equipped to allow prospective job candidates to complete applications and receive interviews on site. The Westin is an equal opportunity employer.
The Westin Denver International Airport will open Nov. 19, 2015. The 433,000 square foot, 14-story hotel and conference center, has 519 guest rooms and will serve as a modern day oasis for both business and leisure travelers at the fifth-busiest airport in the United States.
In addition to the hotel and conference center, there will be an 82,000 square foot open air public plaza that will become Denverâ€™s newest venue for entertainment and relaxation and will create a community connection between the airport and downtown Denver through special event programming by Denver Arts and Venues.
